amendment.description: To change the dates during which contributions may be made to be treated as made in 2013, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2806 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2806 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Hirono.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2806 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Hirono.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2806 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
